entry.title: Flex Rotary Foam Polishing Pads
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 6.99

Heavy Orange - This firm, dense pad is designed to remove swirl marks, scratches and oxidation. The firm composition is able to withstand pressure during extended polishing sessions.

Medium Green - Use this pad with swirl removers and finishing polishes to create a mirror finish.

Soft Black - The softest of the 3 pads, the black pad is ideal for ultra-fine polishes. This pad is perfect for "jeweling" the finish to create the highest level of gloss possible.

entry.title: FLEX XFE15 150 18.0-E.C
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 749.99

XFE 15 18.0-EC Set

The Set includes:

1x Rapid charger CA 18.0

2x Battery pack 18.0/5.0 Ah

1x 5" Backing Plate

1x 6" Backing Plate.

The FLEX XFE15 150 Cordless Orbital Polisher is an orbital polisher with a 15 mm throw that will remove swirls, scratches, and more from your paint – all without having to plug in a cord! Months of development went into the construction of the FLEX XFE15 150 Cordless Orbital Polisher – FLEX needed to make sure the power of the standard FLEX XFE was seamlessly transferred to the new cordless edition; and they’ve certainly succeeded! With an average full-power run time of approximately 45 minutes, the FLEX XFE15 150 Cordless Orbital Polisher allows you the ability to perfect panels of paint – without being plugged in!

Cords can be a real pain. Polishing a car with a corded tool always runs the risk of knocking the cord against the surface you just correct – you may have to go back and do that section all over again! We’ve seen aprons with cord holders, detailing belts with cord holders – but what if the machine had no cord in the first place!?

FLEX has manufactured two of their bestselling polishers (the FLEX XFE and the FLEX PE14), as cordless, battery-operated systems. Powered by either a 5 amp or 2.5 amp (both cordless machines come with two 5 amp batteries, but the 2.5 amp battery is available for purchase separately), lithium-ion battery, the FLEX XFE15 150 Cordless Orbital Polisher packs just as much of a punch as it’s corded counterpart.

entry.title: Lake Country Backing Plate System For Flex XC 3401 VRG
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 64.99

The LC-3401 interchangeable backing plate system is designed by Lake Country Manufacturing and increases the size range of pads for the FLEX XC 3401 VRG polisher. 

The system consists of three plates:

  1. A geared plate (stays on machine)
  2. A 4 inch Backing plate (interchangeable)
  3. A 6 inch Backing plate (interchangeable)

Benefits:

  • Fits 4” to 6 ½” pads
  • Quick change plates allow operator to perform spot detailing as well as full detailing
  • Hook and loop for quick pad changing
  • Maximum versatility and value

entry.title: Flex 2.5 AMP Cordless Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 99.99

FLEX 2.5 AMP CORDLESS BATTERY
FLEX 2.5 Amp Cordless Battery is a lithium-ion high capacity battery used with the FLEX Cordless Polishers. Using advanced technological advancements, the FLEX 2.5 Amp Cordless Battery uses a Phase Change Material (PCM) to keep the battery cool while working, as well as extending the working time and overall battery life. The Electronic Management System (EMS) provides protection to both the battery and the tool and lead to higher efficiency.

FLEX 2.5 Amp Cordless Battery features:

2.5 amps

18 volts

Integrated charge and discharge protection

Fuel gauge

Dust/water splash protection: IX6

Li-Ion cells

Intelligent electronic management system to control working process

Phase-change material for head management

entry.title: Flex Rotary Backing Plates
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 16.99 - 20.99 (3 variants)

  • 5/8 x 11 rotary thread
  • comes in 3 sizes

FLEX Rotary Backing Plates are manufactured to the highest quality standards, starting with the one-piece flexible polyurethane construction. A flexible backing plate is able to conform better to curves and contours, ensuring the pad stays completely flat, thus reducing the chance of instilling holograms. A one-piece design is more robust because it removes the mechanical stress that would be associated with a 2 or 3 piece design.

FLEX Rotary Backing Plates also feature a steel plated threaded insert for added durability. The molded-in hook and loop material will not separate, even after extended polishing sessions at high speeds. Simply put, FLEX Rotary Backing Plates are designed for the long haul.

FLEX Rotary Backing Plates utilize a 5/8 inch diameter shaft that accommodates the FLEX PE8 Kompakt Rotary Polisher and the FLEX PE14-2-150.

entry.title: Flex Swirl Finder Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 59.99

The FLEX Swirl Finder Light is a specially designed LED flashlight that shows the true condition of your paint. The FLEX Swirl Finder Light illuminates swirls that the naked eye cannot see, making it easier to track your progress as you work towards creating a swirl-free finish! The FLEX Swirl Finder Light is a valuable tool for detailers and anyone passionate about a perfect paint finish.

entry.title: Flex PE-8 Kompakt Rotary Polisher with 25ft Cord
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 297.99

This 3" lightweight rotary polisher is great for finer detailing and small, hard to reach areas on marine, auto, and motorcycles. 

The FLEX PE8 Kompakt Rotary Polisher is a purpose-built polisher designed specifically for small, intricate body panels. The FLEX PE8 Kompakt Rotary Polisher is far less cumbersome than a full-size rotary polisher, making it the ideal choice for spot repair, motorcycle detailing, and other applications where size matters! The FLEX PE8 Kompakt Rotary Polisher is lightweight, easy to hold on to, smooth, and powerful. Designed for use with pads ranging from 1 to 3 inches in diameter.

Polisher for small areas

  • Max. polishing pad diameter: 80 mm
  • Max. back-up pad diameter: 75 mm
  • No load speed: 1300-3900 rpm
  • Power input: 800 watt
  • Power output: 350 watt
  • Tool fixture: M 14
  • Weight: 1.8 kg
  • VR electronic control: tachogenerator-controlled constant speed, soft-start, overload protection and speed selection.
  • Lightweight and easy to use on small surfaces, tight spaces.
  • Spidle lock

entry.title: Flex XC 3401 VRG DA Polisher
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 505.99

The orbital rotation of this innovative polisher simulates the circular movement of the human hand while polishing. At the same time, the polisher's highly smooth running facilitates a careful, precise finish and even offers what is necessary for hologram-free polishing. That's just what this polisher, with its ergonomically designed knob handle, was made for. The positive drive ensures a uniform movement, even under load, thanks to constant lift. Taken in conjunction with the large stroke length there is also the possibility of removing existing holograms from black finishes. Thanks to the direct orbital drive, very little heat develops on the surface, which is ideally suited to temperature-sensitive finishes. The accelerator trigger switch and speed selection allow for a controlled acceleration to the optimal speed. Note: the machine's orbital movement has been optimally adapted for the special back pad included with it.

  • 1 grip cover
  • 1 knob grip
  • 1 Special Velcro Backing pad, 5-1/2"

Advantages:

  • FLEX seven-fold microprocessor electronics: with consistent speed control by tachometer generator, soft start, accelerator trigger switch, restart protection after power interruption, overload protection, temperature monitoring, and speed selection
  • 8 mm orbital movement
  • Permanent direct drive for an even polished surface
  • removable, ergonomic knob grip
  • High-powered motor: can handle extreme loads
  • Spindle lock
  • Quality shut-off carbon brushes: if the carbon brushes wear down, the motor will be automatically switched off and thus protected from damage

Polishing a car with a corded tool always runs the risk of knocking the cord against the surface you just correct – you may have to go back and do that section all over again! entry.title: Flex PE-150 Cordless Random Orbital Polisher 18.0 EC Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flex
Type: Polishers & Equipment
Price: 769.99

The Set includes:

  • 1x PE 150 18.0 EC + 1x handle
  • 1x Rapid charger CA 18.0
  • 2x Battery pack 18.0/5.0 

Product ID: 3358

XFE 7-15 150 Dual Action Polisher

Specs:

  • Max pad diameter 160mm
  • Max back-up pad diameter 150mm
  • Orbit: 15mm
  • Orbit rate/No load: 2900-8600 opm
  • Power input: 710 watt
  • Power output: 420 watt
  • Size (LxH): 370x140mm
  • Cable length: 4.0m
  • Weight: 2.4kg

About
The FLEX XFE 7-15 150 Random Orbital Polisher is perfectly balanced for surface finishing perfection. The FLEX XFE 7-15 uses a free-spinning dual action polihser, with a mechanism to gently rub and scrub away scratched and swirled dead layers of paint.  Best used with an abrasive polisher pad and compound. The gentle dual action mechanism helps prevent holograms in conjunction with the large 15mm orbital throw.

The expanded orbital throw mechanism spreads buffing heat over a large area for even surface finishing and fast correction time. Spreading the work from the powerful 710 watt motor over a large surface area keeps temperatures lower, protecting paintwork from heat burn and burn through. The FLEX XFE 7-15 dual action polisher is lightweight, balanced, and easy to handle for any detailing expert or enthusiast.
